message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,000,000. This exclusive opportunity is tailored to meet your needs and expectations. Considering its worth to you, I propose a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is valid for a limited time only, so I encourage you to respond promptly to secure this exceptional deal. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.
